# Results

Relationship: correlation matrix  


Coeffs for all variables and model
```{r results='asis', message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
merged_coefs = data.frame(
  OLS = c(coef_ols[3], coef_ols[4], coef_ols[5], coef_ols[6], coef_ols[7], coef_ols[8], coef_ols[9], coef_ols[10], coef_ols[11], coef_ols[12], coef_ols[13]),
  Ridge = c(ridge_fulldata_coeff),
  Lasso = c(lasso_coef[2], lasso_coef[3], lasso_coef[4], lasso_coef[5], lasso_coef[6], lasso_coef[7], lasso_coef[8], lasso_coef[9], lasso_coef[10], lasso_coef[11]),
  PCR= c(pcr_fulldata_coef),
  PLSR = c(plsr_coef) 
  )

coef_models <- xtable(merged_coefs, caption="Coefficient Estimates for all models")
print(coef_models, type="latex", comment=FALSE, caption.placement='top')
```

Table with each model's MSE.
```{r results='asis', message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
merged_mse <- data.frame(
  Model = c("OLS", "Ridge", "Lasso", "PCR", "PLS"),
  MSE = c(mse_ols, ridge_MSE, lasso_mean, pcr_MSE, plsr_mean))
mse_models <- xtable(merged_mse, caption="MSE for all models")
print(mse_models, type="latex", comment=FALSE, caption.placement='top')
```
